title: So Much News, So Little Time - Melania's Jacket Gaffe & Charlottesville Rally Redux | Mike Shinoda
itunes:title: So Much News, So Little Time - Melania's Jacket Gaffe & Charlottesville Rally Redux | Mike Shinoda
description:
President Trump boasts about his elitism at a rally in Minnesota, Charlottesville racists organize a White Civil Rights march, and Mike Shinoda discusses "Post Traumatic."
